name: TraneHome®
0:
”Alexa, set Kitchen temperature to 72 degrees”
”Alexa, decrease Kitchen temperature by 4 degrees”
”Alexa, set Kitchen to cool”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
To link the skill, you will need to provide the username and password to your Trane® Home account. You will then select the house on the account that you will be controlling. After that, run device discovery with Alexa and your Trane® Home devices will appear, ready to control, in your Alexa app.
 
For your smart thermostat try:
“Alexa, set Kitchen temperature to 72 degrees”
“Alexa, increase Kitchen temperature by 4 degrees”
“Alexa, decrease Kitchen temperature by 4 degrees”
“Alexa, increase Kitchen temperature"
“Alexa, decrease Kitchen temperature”
"Alexa, set Kitchen to cool"
"Alexa, set Kitchen to heat"
"Alexa, set Kitchen to auto"
"Alexa, set Kitchen to off"
 
To use Trane® Home with Alexa you will need a Trane® Home account with connected devices. To set up your Trane® Home account, click the “Sign Up Now” button on the www.tranehome.com website and follow the instructions. From the Alexa app, open the menu and select Skills. Search for and enable the Trane® Home skill, then log in with the Trane® Home account credentials you created previously.

You can log in to Trane® Home at www.tranehome.com, or by using the Trane® Home mobile app by searching "Trane Home" in the App Store or Google Play Store.
